dataElementQuery.annotation: SELECT cn.concept_id,cn.name FROM openmrs.concept_name cn,openmrs.concept c,openmrs.concept_class cc where cn.concept_id = c.concept_id and c.class_id = cc.concept_class_id and cc.name in('Test','Procedure','KMRI_labs') and cn.concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' and cn.locale = 'en'

metaDataValueTemplate.annotation: select count(*) from openmrs.laboratory_test l where l.lab_test_concept_id = #metaDataId and DATE(l.date_created) >= :startOfPeriod and DATE(l.date_created) <= :endOfPeriod and l.lab_location_id = :locationId
